org.svvrl.goal.gui.tool
Class AutomatonTool<T extends Automaton>

java.lang.Object

      org.svvrl.goal.gui.action.WindowAction<O>

              org.svvrl.goal.gui.tool.Tool<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the automaton
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action, Drawer, TabSwitchedListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractControllerTool, AbstractStateTool, AbstractTransitionTool, AccTool, ColoringTool, DeleteTool, FocusStateTool, SelectTool, TestTool
public abstract class AutomatonTool<T extends Automaton>
extends Tool<T>
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, Drawer

An AutomatonTool is an abstraction of tool intended to operate on automata.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
